overview: Wherever the Universe carried her, / she heard the waves of the ocean. / And like a newborn turtle, the subconscious memory always knew the route to home. Maima: The Water Spirit is a dance performance exploring the language of movement as a way of communication and time travel through music. Maima channels what makes one feel at home by embodying the elements of water through the tides and earth through the sand.
title: Maima: The Water Spirit
